```lisp
[
  (:action peel
   :parameters (?actor - agent ?coconut - coconut ?tool - tool ?container - container)
   :precondition (and
                   (or (has_outer_casing ?coconut) (wrapped ?coconut ?tool))
                   (sharp ?tool)
                   (not (peeled ?coconut))
                   (empty ?container))
   :effect (and
             (peeled ?coconut)
             (exposed_shell ?coconut)
             (drained ?coconut)
             (filled ?container)
             (not (has_outer_casing ?coconut))
             (not (wrapped ?coconut ?tool)))
  )

  (:action wrap
   :parameters (?item - object ?cover - object)
   :precondition (and
                   (not (wrapped ?item ?cover))
                   (or (and (coconut ?item) (coconut_intact ?item))
                       (drained ?item))
                   (clean ?cover))
   :effect (and
             (wrapped ?item ?cover)
             (not (clean ?cover)))
  )

  (:action smash
   :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?tool - tool)
   :precondition (and
                   (prepared ?item)
                   (usable ?tool)
                   (not (processed ?item)))
   :effect (and
             (processed ?item)
             (not (prepared ?item)))
  )
]
```
